bsdhistory.text: #BSDHistory : #MirOS BSD started on 29. August 2002, combining OpenBSD (-current) and NetBSD (-current) at that time
#BSDHistory : #ARM port of #NetBSD was added in NetBSD 1.2 (Oct 1996)
#BSDHistory: The source for #NetBSD is derived from #386BSD 0.1, patched with the 0.2.2 patch kit
#BSDHistory : #FreeBSD first shipped #IPv6 support in March 2000 as part of FreeBSD 4.0-Release.
